symbol.description: The symbol of the market. The symbol is the same as the waypoint where the market is located.

exports.description: The list of goods that are exported from this market.

imports.description: The list of goods that are sought as imports in this market.

exchange.description: The list of goods that are bought and sold between agents at this market.

transactions.description: The list of recent transactions at this market. Visible only when a ship is present at the market.

tradeGoods.description: The list of goods that are traded at this market. Visible only when a ship is present at the market.
